    Braunston to Marston Doles 1st-9th November 2018 Our route Not much room for manoeuvre there! Onwards again, we tried to stop at a water tap & elsan point but there were two boats moored there, so no room for us. We snuck into an empty private mooring whilst we investigated....

  • A Visit From Jack Frost

    Northampton to Braunston 23rd-31st October 2018 Our route A beautiful place to moor, opposite an old hazel coppice. Turning Liberty Belle at Northampton we resorted to yanking her around with the bow rope as the wind was quite strong. We had 16 locks to look forward to before mooring up...

    November 1, 2018
    in Libertybelle
